item.title: 【VB源码】VB计算谷歌pr查询加密参数模块
item.description: Option Explicit '计算谷歌pr查询加密参数模块 '示例: "http://toolbarqueries.google.com/search?client=navclient-auto&ch=" & GetGoogleKey("www.baidu.com") & "&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&features=Rank:FVN&q=info:" & "www.baidu.com" '算法有点问题,部分参数计算错误。影响不是太大。 Const GOOGLE_MAGIC = &HE6359A60 Function GetGoogleKey(Url) As String  '获取加密参数 GetGoogleKey = "6"
